query_data¶

Analytical query layer for admissions reporting metrics.

query_data._s(query_text)[source]¶

Build a composable SQL statement from module-owned static SQL text.

Parameters:

query_text (str) – Static SQL source text defined in this module.

Returns:

Composable SQL object ready for psycopg execution.

Return type:

psycopg.sql.Composable

query_data._clamp_limit(limit, minimum=1, maximum=100)[source]¶

Clamp a requested row limit to a safe bounded range.

Parameters:

  • limit (int) – Requested row limit.

  • minimum (int) – Minimum allowed limit value.

  • maximum (int) – Maximum allowed limit value.

Returns:

Clamped limit within [minimum, maximum].

Return type:

int

query_data._compose_limited_query(query, limit)[source]¶

Build a LIMIT-capped SQL statement around an arbitrary base query.

Parameters:

  • query (psycopg.sql.Composable) – Base composable SQL statement.

  • limit (int) – Requested row limit.

Returns:

Tuple of composed statement and clamped limit value.

Return type:

tuple[psycopg.sql.Composable, int]

query_data._query_scalar(query)[source]¶

Return the first scalar value from a SQL query.

Parameters:

query (psycopg.sql.Composable) – Query expected to return at least one scalar cell.

Returns:

First scalar value from the query result.

Return type:

object

query_data._build_overview_metrics()[source]¶

Build top-level overview metrics used by the dashboard.

query_data._build_academic_metrics()[source]¶

Build average-score and acceptance-rate metrics.

query_data._build_program_metrics()[source]¶

Build targeted program/university query metrics.

query_data._build_additional_metrics()[source]¶

Build term comparison and GPA-reporting acceptance metrics.

query_data.run_analysis()[source]¶

Compute all dashboard metrics from the admissions table.

Returns:

Aggregated analysis payload for UI/API responses.

Return type:

dict[str, object]

query_data.execute_query(query, params=None, limit=100)[source]¶

Execute a SQL query and return all result rows.

Parameters:

  • query (psycopg.sql.Composable) – SQL query composable to execute.

  • params (list | tuple | None) – Optional SQL parameter values for placeholders in query.

  • limit (int) – Maximum number of rows to return, clamped to [1, 100].

Returns:

List of row tuples fetched from PostgreSQL.

Return type:

list[tuple]

Raises:

RuntimeError – Wrapped database exception with contextual message.
